shared.model

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that represents the map of the game. It knows where all the hexes are and what their number chits are. It knows where all the harbors and edges and vertexes are and who has built on them. It is mostly a container class.
    Invariants
    There is only one port of each type and two misc ports

      • GameMap

        public GameMap(java.lang.String map_json)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Builds a GameMap based on a JSON string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        map_json is a valid standardized form json object for a Catan map
        Post-Conditions
        a map is created and reflects the data serialized

        Parameters:
        number -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        number is between 2 and 12
        Post-Conditions
        result = an array of the 1 or 2 hexes with this number

        Parameters:
        number -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        number is between 2 and 12
        Post-Conditions
        gives an array with the same indexes as the players saying what they each get from a roll

      • getPortsAccessibleTo

        public Port[] getPortsAccessibleTo(int player)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a list of Ports accessible to the player by color
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        the index is a real player
        Post-Conditions
        result = an array of ports accessible to that player based on where they have buildings or an empty array if that player controlls no ports

                   CatanColor player_color)
        Determines whether that edge represents a valid road placement
        Parameters:
        edge -
        player_color -
        Pre-Conditions
        the player_color is currently playing and the edge exists in the map
        Post-Conditions
        returns true iff it is a valid road placement

        Parameters:
        type -
        location -
        player_color -
        Pre-Conditions
        the player with this color is playing the game, the location is on the map
        Post-Conditions
        result is True if this is a valid building placement based on existing structures on the map
